title: Brandon Semenuk Flipping His Bicycle Off the Side of a Mountain
content:
The thing about going out into the badlands of Alberta and riding your bicycle off the side of the mountain and doing flips where you kick your legs out and such, is the flips isnâ€™t really the hardest part here. The hard part is making it look as great and stylish as Brandon Semenuk does here in Afterlife.
